articles.content: Former India skipper Virat Kohli returned with yet another poor figure with the bat in the opening ODI match of the three-match series against West Indies on Sunday, yet he managed to smash another o… [+1763 chars]

articles.content: West Indies couldn't quite hit the ground up and running in the opening ODI and folded for 176 after being asked to bat in Ahmedabad. Yuzvendra Chahal's four wickets and Washinton Sundar's three hurt… [+2136 chars]

articles.title: Here's What Dinesh Karthik Said When Asked About Playing For CSK In IPL - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Indian wicketkeeper-batters have usually been in demand in the IPL auction and Karthik, who is back in the auction after a long association with Kolkata Knight Riders, can once again land a lucrative deal.
